content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI tried to browse the website provided in the previous command but received an error message. The server had an error while processing my request and suggested retrying or contacting their help center. The error message included a request ID to include in any messages to their help center.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
Nothing new happened.
"""
